h2_title: Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master Boss Fight and Guide
content: Finally, if he sheathes his sword entirely to concentrate on sending his electric talismans at you, prepare for a length barrage. As he performs a gesture with his hands low, he'll bring them up as he explodes with energy, and then send a salvo of electric talismans flying at you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Hundred-Eyed_Daoist_Master.md', within the main section titled 'Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master', specifically from the subsection 'Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Finally, if he sheathes his sword entirely to concentrate on sending his electric talismans at you, prepare for a length barrage. As he performs a gesture with his hands low, he'll bring them up as he explodes with energy, and then send a salvo of electric talismans flying at you.
